name: Supermarket 3D: Shopping Deals
description:
Enter into mall of america be a rich girl and have some special shopping. Spend money to buy Christmas gifts for virtual family and Go to cash counter of supermarket grocery store simulator.

Game Features:
· Multiple grocery store items to shop
· Cashier atm machine game
· Amazing Shopping center Environment
· Shopping girl cash register game
· Super market, mall shopping game
· Stunning supermarket graphics and sound effects
